    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Applicant
    Represents an HDB applicant in the system.
    ApplicantInterface
    This class provides the interface for Applicants to interact with the HDB application system.
    ApplicantService
    ApplicantService provides services related to HDB project applications for an applicant.
    Application
    Represents an application submitted by a user for an HDB project.
    Application.ApplicationStatus
    Enum representing the status of an application.
    Application.FlatType
    Enum representing the type of flat applied for.
    ApplicationDatabase
    Singleton class that manages the storage and retrieval of Application objects.
    ApplicationView
    Provides static methods to display and generate various views and reports related to Application entities.
    AuthService
    AuthService handles user authentication and account-related operations such as login validation and password changes.
    BaseInterface
    Abstract base class for all user interface types (e.g., ApplicantInterface, OfficerInterface).
    DateUtil
    Utility class for handling date-related operations such as retrieving the current date, checking if a date is within a given project period, and detecting date range overlaps.
    Enquiry
    Represents an enquiry made by a user regarding a project.
    EnquiryDatabase
    Singleton class that manages the storage, retrieval, and persistence of Enquiry objects.
    EnquiryView
    Provides static methods to display details related to Enquiry entities.
    FilterSettings
    Represents a set of filter settings for filtering and sorting housing projects.
    FilterSettings.SortType
    Enum representing available sorting options.
    FlatType
    Represents a type of flat available in a housing project, including the number of units available and the price.
    HDBManager
    Represents an HDB Manager user in the system.
    HDBOfficer
    Represents an HDB Officer, who is a special type of applicant responsible for handling a housing project.
    IApplicantService
    Interface for services related to an HDB applicant.
    IManagerService
    Interface for services related to an HDB Manager.
    InterfaceFactory
    Factory class to create the appropriate user interface (UI) instance based on the role of the provided User.
    IOfficerService
    Interface for services related to an HDB Officer.
    IProjectService
    Interface for services related to managing and retrieving project data.
    Main
    The entry point of the BTO Management System application.
    ManagerInterface
    ManagerInterface provides the command-line interface functionalities available to HDB Managers.
    ManagerService
    Service class for handling all manager-related operations such as creating and editing projects, managing officer registrations, applications, withdrawals, and responding to enquiries.
    OfficerInterface
    OfficerInterface provides the command-line interface for users who are HDB officers.
    OfficerService
    Service class providing functionalities for HDB officers, including project registrations, application handling, enquiry responses, and project filtering.
    Project
    Represents a public housing project managed by the HDB.
    ProjectDatabase
    Singleton class responsible for managing project data including loading from and saving to a CSV file.
    ProjectService
    Service class that provides functionalities to manage and filter HDB projects.
    ProjectView
    Provides static methods to display information related to Project entities, including views tailored to user roles such as officers and applicants.
    Registration
    Represents a registration made by an HDB officer for a specific project.
    Registration.Status
    Enum representing the registration status.
    RegistrationDatabase
    Singleton class for managing registration records between HDB Officers and Projects.
    RegistrationView
    Provides static methods to display information related to Registration entities, which represent HDB officer registrations for project assignments.
    User
    Represents a generic user in the system.
    User.UserRole
    Enum representing the roles a user can have in the system.
    UserDatabase
    Singleton class that manages the loading, storing, and retrieval of user data, including Applicants, HDB Officers, and HDB Managers.
    UserView
    Provides static methods to display information related to Applicant entities, particularly their associated application and personal details.
